item.title: Aquarius Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
If the daily grind is getting you down right now, seek the comfort of your home, friends and family. These things will help you feel more grounded and content. So bow out of wild adventures right now -- and get back in touch with the truly important things in life. Your people would love a chance to spend some more time with you. Also, quite a few of your relationships could use a bit more of your attention, and the timing is perfect for that now.

item.title: Aries Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
You might feel a bit under siege today -- many people may be demanding your time and energy, when you want to focus on your home and your family. Trying to negotiate with these people will likely be disappointing; they are so focused on themselves today that they will have a hard time taking your personal needs seriously. Feel free to disengage and do what you need and want to do. Don't burn any bridges -- but do take note of the people who react especially poorly.

item.title: Cancer Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
Your eye for detail will get you into a very interesting situation today, when something almost imperceptible about a new acquaintance grabs your attention. You are noticing things about people that they don't realize yet about themselves. Hold on to these little revelations -- they are your secrets, and you should divulge them only if you want to. One person in particular is about to blossom in a way that she or he never expected. Enjoy your front-row seat!

item.title: Capricorn Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
Trying too hard to fit in can really drain your energy, so stop trying! You need to understand that just being yourself makes you much more desirable than trying to be a carbon copy of someone else does. By sticking to your own identity, you show people that you are proud of who you are -- and that you're strong. If you act too wishy-washy or are constantly trying to meet the expectations of others, you show people that you don't know who you really are -- which isn't true.

item.title: Gemini Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
If you feel good, then the people who love you will also feel good -- so don't feel guilty if you put your desires above other people's today. You deserve some indulgences right now, and you should think about something nice you can do for yourself. Should you treat yourself to a spa day? Or how about going on a weekend trip to one of your favorite places? Whatever you do, do it all the way. This is not the time for cutting corners.

item.title: Leo Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
Someone who you thought was on your side, and whom you've been relying on as a confidant, might be acting as a double agent in a relatively trivial caper. If you've been planning an event for a friend, resist the urge to delegate too much to someone who seems just a little bit too eager to help. This person may have an ulterior motive. While you shouldn't doubt the people you love and trust, be a bit wary of people who haven't yet proved themselves to you.

item.title: Libra Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
After a lot of socializing recently, you are finally getting the chance to spend some quality time on your own. You may think you still want to be out and about and enjoying the wild life today, but once you get a little taste of solitude, you will settle into it happily. This inward-focused time is a luxury. Feel free to ignore the rest of the world (as much as you can) and enjoy some introspection and relaxation.

item.title: Pisces Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
You're projecting an aura of calm confidence today -- so who cares if you aren't feeling quite as confident as you look? Image can be a powerful thing, and you can use yours to make waves that turn the tide your way! Your bravado is a mask you can wear to make it through the tough times -- the times when you don't feel completely comfortable. In any new situation you encounter today, try to look as though you know what you're doing, even if you don't.

item.title: Sagittarius Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
With a huge increase in your energy level coming, you run the risk of rushing ahead before you're totally ready to move forward. Beware of leaving the house without a coat, forgetting your keys in the lock or driving to the bank but leaving your wallet at home! Your mind is busy cooking up big ideas and imagining big outcomes -- but you're in danger of forgetting to tie your shoes! Watch for absentmindedness today -- don't lose sight of the here and now!

item.title: Scorpio Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
If you're stuck in planning mode today, make it a group affair. Getting a consensus about dates, locations and activities will make everyone feel like part of the big picture -- and it will set a much more positive tone for your upcoming event. Other people will be able to suggest things that you hadn't considered before -- and they will also remember small details that make a big impression. There's no question that a group effort is the best effort.

item.title: Taurus Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
Your charm will meet its delightful match today, when you run into someone you know through a friend. This person's flattering words and witty conversation will entertain you -- and make you aware of some facets of your personality that you weren't aware of before. Turns out, you are even more charming than you thought! Listening to and laughing with this person could take up your whole day if you let it, so keep an eye on your schedule.

item.title: Virgo Daily Extended Horoscopes for June 25, 2012
item.description:
It's the small details that will cause the biggest problems today, so get out your magnifying glass and take a closer look at what's going down today. Little comments a friend whispers to himself or herself will reveal big truths -- so don't pretend you don't hear them. It's time to deal with this issue once and for all, and put negative feelings behind you. It will feel good to get rid of the tiny doubts that you've been having about your relationship.
